name: mini axolotl tapestry
notes:
this is a very quick and easy pattern that is great for beginners to tapestry crochet. once finished, you will have an adorable axolotl that could be used as anything from a coaster to miniature wall decor!
this pattern can use any yarn size, but using a different size will make a different sized tapestry. when worsted weight yarn is used, the tapestry will be about 3.5 x 3.5 inches.

materials needed:
4.5 mm crochet hook, or whatever size matches your yarn
pink yarn
dark pink yarn
white yarn
black yarn
scissors and needle
short dowel

the tapestry can be made with any scrap yarn, so you need less than one skein of each color.
